articles.description: Sir Geoff Hurst wants to see new heading restrictions in the professional game and has called for a complete heading ban for young children.
articles.content:
Sir Geoff Hurst wants to see new heading restrictions in the professional game and has called for a complete heading ban for young children.

articles.title: Ferran Torres scores hat-trick as Spain hit Germany for six in Nations League - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Goals from Alvaro Morata, Torres, his Manchester City team-mate Rodri and Mikel Oyarzabal secure Spain a place in the Nations League finals
articles.content:
Manchester City winger Ferran Torres scored a hat-tuck as Spain thrashed Germany 6-0 in Sevilla to secure a place in the Nations League finals at the top of Group A2.
